root: ^Hey you, stop right there! The elder instructed not to allow anyone past this gate and a mere child such as yourself is no exception, unless a troublesome accident were to compromise the safety of our people, you must stay. Until then, I bid you return at once.
^Ugh mom, how did you deal with these kinds of people on a daily basis? The river is literally next to the village, what could possibly happen!
^What are you staring at, did you not hear what I said? Disobeying the orders of the Elder could put many at risk.
